definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: folly.—abs. Pr 12:23 +; cstr. Pr 14:8 +; sf. [[אִוַּלְתִּי]] Ps 38:6, etc.;—folly, special product of [[כְּסִילִים]] (v. [[כֶּסֶל]]) Pr 12:23 + (12 t.); c. [[פְּתָאִים]] Pr 14:18; c. [[אֱוִלִיים]] only Pr 16:22, Pr 27:22 for alliteration. It is bound up in mind of boy, to be removed only by rod of discipline Pr 22:15; ´[[א]] personif. tears down house built by [[חַכְמוֹת נׇשִׁים]] Pr 14:1; it is contrasted with [[תְּבוּנׇה]] Pr 14:29, Pr 15:21.
